description.value: You're determined to amass a fortune and send a portion of the profits back home. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for one Lore skill of your choiceâ€”the Lore you choose must be related to your business or profession, such as Accounting Lore, Corporate Lore, or Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income} with your chosen Lore. In addition, whenever you successfully Earn Income, you earn an additional 10%. This additional income is transferred directly to your home community's accounts and can't be accessed or used by you in any way.
